section.name: Contributors
section.p: Here's a list of contributors of the SignServer project.

ul.li: Philip Vendil, herrvendil(at)users.sourceforge.net, Former main developer of the framework.
Lars Silvén, lars(at)primekey.se, SSL-RMI parts and the possibility to have custom web front end.
Tomas Gustavsson, tomas(at)primekey.se, Core developer, PDF Signer, PKCS11 sign token, Improved the TSA client with more arguments, MRTD SOD signer, etc etc.
Markus Kilås, markus(at)primekey.se, Core developer, XML Signer/validator, MRTD SOD signer, etc etc.
Ezizmuhammed Muhamedkuliyev, rayback2(at)gmail.com, OOXML, ODF Signer/validator, PDF signer, CRL/OCSP validators.
Christophe Sahut, christophe.sahut(at)sgs.com, Install howto for SignServer 3.1 on RHEL systems. See doc/howtos.
Bruno Bonfils, French install howto for SignServer 3.2. See wiki.opencsi.com.
Marcus Lundblad, marcus.lundblad(at)primekey.se, Core developer, Down-for-maintenance support, archiving of time-stamp requests, etc etc.
Antoine Louiset, antoine.louiset(at)yousign.fr, installation package for SignServer 3.2 on Debian. See doc/howtos.
